entry.source: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F87B,4,4,1,1}{F813,0,223002}Ah, it's here on the floor. Shall we{F801}get this over with?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Walter\0{F87A,4}{F87B,4,4,1,1}{F813,0,223002}Ah, it's here on the floor. Shall we{F801}get this over with?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}King Kenji\0{F87A,202}{F87B,202,1,1,1}{F813,0,223005}Some call me that... But it doesn't{F801}matter.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}King Kenji\0{F87A,202}{F87B,202,1,1,1}{F813,0,223005}Some call me that... But it doesn't{F801}matter.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}King Kenji\0{F87A,202}{F87B,202,1,1,1}{F813,0,223006}You're the Intruders, right?{F801}{F802}{F813,0,223007}Forget about the remote... I'm getting{F801}tired of killing.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}King Kenji\0{F87A,202}{F87B,202,1,1,1}{F813,0,223006}You're the Intruders, right?{F801}{F802}{F813,0,223007}Forget about the remote... I'm getting{F801}tired of killing.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Jonathan\0{F87A,3}{F87B,3,12,1,1}{F87B,4,3,1,1}{F813,0,223008}We must return to our own world. And{F801}in order to do that, we require that{F801}the gate to the Expanse be opened.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Jonathan\0{F87A,3}{F87B,3,12,1,1}{F87B,4,3,1,1}{F813,0,223008}We must return to our own world. And{F801}in order to do that, we require that{F801}the gate to the Expanse be opened.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}King Kenji\0{F87A,202}{F87B,202,1,1,1}{F813,0,223009}So in the end, it boils down to this...{F801}{F802}{F813,0,223010}You want the remote so bad you're{F801}willing to fight me?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}King Kenji\0{F87A,202}{F87B,202,1,1,1}{F813,0,223009}So in the end, it boils down to this...{F801}{F802}{F813,0,223010}You want the remote so bad you're{F801}willing to fight me?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}King Kenji\0{F87A,202}{F87B,202,1,1,1}{F813,0,223012}...Thought not. There's no need for{F801}us to fight.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,223013}Don't come back here.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}King Kenji\0{F87A,202}{F87B,202,1,1,1}{F813,0,223012}...Thought not. There's no need for{F801}us to fight.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,223013}Don't come back here.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Voice\0{F87A,202}{F813,0,223014}...I told you not to come back.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Voice\0{F87A,202}{F813,0,223014}...I told you not to come back.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}King Kenji\0{F87A,202}{F813,0,223015}You really want that remote, huh?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}King Kenji\0{F87A,202}{F813,0,223015}You really want that remote, huh?{F801}

entry.source: 〉 Walter picked up the remote from{F801}the ground.{F801}
entry.target: 〉 Walter picked up the remote from{F801}the ground.{F801}

entry.source: Press the button{F801}Don't press the button{F801}
entry.target: Press the button{F801}Don't press the button{F801}

entry.source: 〉 {F843,0} and his fellow Samurai{F801}exited the room.{F801}
entry.target: 〉 {F843,0} and his fellow Samurai{F801}exited the room.{F801}

entry.source: 〉 Walter ran to the center of the room.{F801}
entry.target: 〉 Walter ran to the center of the room.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Jonathan\0{F87A,3}{F813,0,223019}Hold.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,223020}I feel it may be bad luck for you to{F801}press it. Let's give it to {F843,0}.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Jonathan\0{F87A,3}{F813,0,223019}Hold.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,223020}I feel it may be bad luck for you to{F801}press it. Let's give it to {F843,0}.{F801}

entry.source: 〉 {F843,0} was surprised by the sudden noise {F801}and dropped the remote...{F801}
entry.target: 〉 {F843,0} was surprised by the sudden noise {F801}and dropped the remote...{F801}

entry.source: 〉 {F843,0} received the remote from{F801}Walter.{F801}{F802}〉 Press the button on the remote?{F801}
entry.target: 〉 {F843,0} received the remote from{F801}Walter.{F801}{F802}〉 Press the button on the remote?{F801}
